title: SolWatch - Sundial Watch Face
summary: A sundial on your wrist that works even on cloudy days.
description: The SolWatch watchface realistically simulates a sundial and it's shadow based on your location and time zone. The watch face works even when clouds cover the sun.IMPORTANT:For a correct operation of SolWatch it is necessary that your entered location (latidute and longitude) fits to your timezone. The times for sunrise and sunset are calculated from these coordinates.The location is by default set to Berlin.Buy SolWatch Premium Settings by In-App purchase to costumize the look of your SolWatch.SolWatch Premium Settings lets you modify:- style ( marble , wood, metal or gold )- type of digits ( Roman or Arabic numerals )- location coordinates- show/hide date- show/hide time- time format- show/hide shadow at nightThe sundial SolWatch is not only suitable for round smartwatches like Moto 360 or LG Urbane. It also looks great on squared watches like the ASUS ZenWatch.
descriptionHTML:
The SolWatch watchface realistically simulates a sundial and it's shadow based on your location and time zone.
The watch face works even when clouds cover the sun.

IMPORTANT:
For a correct operation of SolWatch it is necessary that your entered location (latidute and longitude) fits to your timezone. The times for sunrise and sunset are calculated from these coordinates.
The location is by default set to Berlin.

Buy SolWatch Premium Settings by In-App purchase to costumize the look of your SolWatch.

SolWatch Premium Settings lets you modify:
- style ( marble , wood, metal or gold )
- type of digits ( Roman or Arabic numerals )
- location coordinates
- show/hide date
- show/hide time
- time format
- show/hide shadow at night

The sundial SolWatch is not only suitable for round smartwatches like Moto 360 or LG Urbane. It also looks great on squared watches like the ASUS ZenWatch.
